title: Bill for the Registration of Therawada Bhikkhu Kathikawatha
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. D.M. Jayaratne, Minister of Buddha Sasana and Religious Affairs, to refer the draft formulated for the purpose for the Legal Draftsman to prepare necessary legislation in accordance with the recommendations of the most Ven. Mahanayake Theros of the Three Sects, was approved by the Cabinet.
